review.title: “A good platform to learn about events cordination”
review.pros: Pros – a good place for those who graduate to gain experience in all expect of work and level to make decision and learning leadership skills thru their in-house booth camp and coursers to achieve result.
review.cons: Cons – To much of all hours and stay backs till way past 2-am or 4-am to meet deadline for events and even to work on weekends week after week and if not working late there will be always calls way in the early morning at 2-5am to answer calls and sms etc. which kills much sleep and puts you on stress mode in the next few hours to work and all sleep is disrupt and week of resentfulness sets in.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The management should learn to give good rest to staff during peak period or have split shift for those who need to work late.The MD and management always have late night meetings and make the middle level staff to wait till all is over just handling light duties and this creates disatification for those with family and chilren
